title: Faces of India: Raju, a guide from Rishikesh
creator_credit: Yavar Abbas and Face Film Productions
brief_description: Gives an intimate insight into the lives of the ordinary people in Rishikesh in the Himalayan foothills. The film follows a nine-year-old boy through a day’s work taking visitors around the town. We hear Raju giving facts and figures and details of everything he sees. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
